Title: Malicious Package
Description:
All versions of `sdfjghlkfjdshlkjdhsfg` contain malicious code. The package is essentially a worm that fetches all packages owned by the user, adds a script to self-replicate as a preinstall script and publishes a new version. ## Recommendation

Remove the package from your environment and ensure all packages owned were not impacted.
Solution: Unfortunately, there is no solution available yet.
